item.description:
We are in need of a few volunteers to attend the FMSSF table. If you are interested, please contact Rose at RoseMellino@gmail.com.


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Saturday, May 18, 2013

9:00 a.m.

3rd Annual Run for Conservation!

Dear Friends,

The 3rd Annual Run for Conservation is on Saturday, May 18, 2012 in DCR's Myles Standish State Forest in Plymouth!

Details:
1/2 road, 1/2 trail 5k (3.1 mile) walk/run race
9:00 am Start Time

Pre & Post-Race Eco-Fair

First 100 registrants are guaranteed a free race t-shirt!
Special barefoot division (with barefoot and Vibram fivefingers allowed)!
Enter a team of five friends, coworkers, or family!
New Non-profit Team Registration: Gather three colleagues of your non-profit (family members count!) and compete for title of fastest nonprofit in the South Shore. Discounted registration fee of $20 for nonprofits.

Register Now! http://www.active.com/running/plymouth-ma/run-for-conservation-5k-2013

Eco-Fair Vendors / Race Sponsors / Volunteers:
To become an Eco-Fair vendor, race sponsor, or volunteer, email admin@wildlandstrust.org. Volunteers will receive a free volunteer race t-shirt while supplies last!
Like the Run for Conservation Facebook Page to receive race updates!
You can also help support the Run for Conservation by donating on Crowdrise.
If you are running the 5k and would like to create your own fundraising page click here.

All proceeds support our efforts to save the special places in southeastern Massachusetts!
The Run for Conservation is a member of the Bayside Runner Racing Series!

To learn more about the series, visit:
http://www.baysiderunner.com/events/partner-races/

Sponsors

Wildlands Trust is a 501 (c) (3) non-profit organization dedicated to conserving land and preserving the natural heritage of Southeastern Massachusetts. We work to permanently protect and steward important habitats and landscapes, including woodlands and fields, ponds, coastal areas, agricultural lands, and river systems.

Membership: Wildlands Trust is a member-supported organization. Not a member? Please click here to join today! Your donation will support our efforts to save the special places of Southeastern Massachusetts before they are lost forever!

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: 3rd Annual Run/Walk for Conservation!
